title: Reset Password
subtitle: Enter your email and new password to reset your account.
enterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
invalidToken: Invalid reset token. Please request a new password reset.
passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now sign in with your new password.
failedToReset: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
